snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton received a lighthearted offering from her staff at the State Department, where she returned for the first time after being treated for a blot clot in her brain.
abstract: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton receives football helmet from her staff at State Department, lighthearted moment upon her return to work after being treated for blood clot in her brain following head injury sustained in a fall.
lead_paragraph: Hillary Rodham Clinton received a lighthearted offering from her staff at the State Department, where she returned for the first time after being treated for a blot clot in her brain.

headline.seo: Clinton Returns to Work at State Department
headline.main: A Gag Gift for Clinton as She Returns to State Dept.
headline.print_headline: A Gag Gift For Clinton As She Returns To State Dept.
